name: CrazyCubes - Mobile Low Poly Game
summary:
CrazyCubes is a simple intuitive, gyroscope based game that WILL frustrate you in anger, but rewards you generously when you do finish every part of the game. 
 
Play a role of a cube in avoiding.. other cubes in a fast paced and challenging environment that is designed to stop you from having any kind of satisfaction. 
 
__________________________________________________________________________________ 
 
CrazyCubes started off from a tutorial from Brackeys (A Unity focused channel that uploads tutorials for beginners). But, I had different ideas on how to expand this simple mobile game and make it more interesting with lots of additional features. 
 
A little about me: I'm currently studying Computer Science/Systems Eng at University and was curious about Unity, so decided to experiment with it and a year and half later of working on a single game, here I am.
